movie.title: Skateboard or Die
movie.description_intro: Mike, an easygoing military dropout is thrust into a hidden world of murder and assassination after running into his best friend Ed, after 10 years of thinking he was Killed In Action. In order to save Mike's fiancee Sarah and keep themselves alive, Mike and Ed must now work together as members of - The Hunters Club. 'The Hunters Club' is a gun toting, fist fighting, skateboarding, independent action flick, shot in Brisbane and the Gold Coast Qld, Australia.
movie.description_full: Mike, an easygoing military dropout is thrust into a hidden world of murder and assassination after running into his best friend Ed, after 10 years of thinking he was Killed In Action. 'The Hunters Club' is a gun toting, fist fighting, skateboarding, independent action flick, shot in Brisbane and the Gold Coast Qld, Australia.

movies.title: Super 8
movies.summary: SPOILER: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident. Shortly after, unusual disappearances and inexplicable events begin to take place in town, and the local Deputy tries to uncover the truth - something more terrifying than any of them could have imagined.

movies.title: Necronomicon: Book of Dead
movies.summary: H.P. Lovecraft, the well-known horror writer, is looking in the late thirties after the book 'Necronomicon'. He finds it guarded by monks in an old library. He then copies some stories from it, which unfold for our eyes- and his...

movies.title: Crawlspace
movies.summary: A group of elite soldiers sent to infiltrate and extract the lead science team from Pine Gap, Australia's top secret underground military compound, after it comes under attack from unknown forces. The mission is compromised when they encounter a young woman with no memory of who she is or how she came to be there. As they try to escape, the group quickly discovers all is not as it seems and the facility has become a testing ground for something far more sinister."

movies.title: Vitals
movies.summary: On vacation, a man wakes up in an abandoned motel room in a tub of ice and his kidney missing. It's only a matter of time before he finds his wife in the adjacent room waiting to be the next victim to a horrible organ harvesting organization. Originally taking the vacation to work on their failing marriage, they must now set their differences aside and use each other's wits and skills to escape before their captors return and their dark secrets are revealed.
